frames.caption: A person in an orange jacket gently interacts with a standing polar bear on a boat. The bear appears calm as the person uses a blue cloth to wipe its fur. Icebergs and a calm sea form the backdrop of this serene scene.
frames.description: The scene is set on a boat in a cold, icy environment, likely in the Arctic. A person is tending to a polar bear, creating a moment of connection between human and animal.

frames.caption: A person in an orange jacket is gently drying a polar bear with a blue towel on a boat. The scene takes place in a cold, icy environment with icebergs visible in the background.
frames.description: The scene depicts a human-animal interaction in an Arctic setting, highlighting a moment of care and connection between a person and a polar bear. The boat is surrounded by calm waters and distant icebergs, suggesting a remote and chilly location.

summary: People: person. Animals: polar bear. Nature: iceberg, sea, icebergs, water. Objects: boat, jacket, cloth, towel. Actions: interacting, wiping, drying, standing. Emotions: calm, gentle. Scenes: Arctic, wildlife interaction. Concepts: human-animal bond, care
